fields.title: Move apt folder from 'dagger' to 'gen'
fields.body:
In preparation for #80 being merged, change the apt generated folder to *gen*.

This may cause disruption for Eclipse checkouts.

- rm *.factorypath*
- remove apt related lines in *.settings/org.eclipse.jdt.apt.core.prefs*
- remove apt related lines in *.settings/org.eclipse.jdt.core.prefs*
- run ant
